title: U.S. Aims to Constrain China by Shaping Its Environment, Blinken Says
content:
1. U.S. Aims to Constrain China by Shaping Its Environment, Blinken Says  The New York Times
  2. Blinken lays out US strategy to counter China as rivalry grows  Al Jazeera English
  3. U.S. Alarmed by China's Support of Putin's War in Ukraine  Newsweek
  4. Blinken says US is ready to strengthen diplomacy with China in 'charged moment for the world'  CNN
  5. Blinken Warns of Chinese Dominance in Long-Delayed Speech  Bloomberg

localize.title: 米国は中国の環境を整えることで中国を抑制する狙いがある、とブリンケン氏は語る。
布林肯说，美国旨在通过塑造中国的环境来限制中国的发展。
布林肯說，美國旨在通過塑造中國的環境來限制中國的發展。
